## Source: amazon-inspector (2d68bf61b3458f8965a4a4fb7d30007c37aaddd4a98ef70d354064df191e587e)
The package elf-stats-cosy-sleigh-356 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (43e46a0bed35ce4be86328e6015014bb6db224d38e70ab466202c79bad015323)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-cosy-sleigh-356' @ 99.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
